Parameters.Name: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 Features detection
Test.Name: GetServices and Digest suported
Test.Description: GetServices - supported. Digest - supported.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recording can be created Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="true"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Correct response. A.10: number of recordings = MaxRecordings
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings equal to MexRecordings Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="true"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect response. A.10: Fault on DeleteRecording
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Number of existing recordings equal to MexRecordings DUT sends fault message Annex A.6: Attempt to set recording configuration. DUT sends fault message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Correct response. A.10: recordings can not be deleted
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recordings can not be deleted Annex A.6: Set config for existing recording

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Correct response. Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="false"
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recording can be created Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="false"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Annex A.6: Fault on CreateRecordingResponse message
Test.Description: Annex A.6: Fault on CreateRecordingResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: No CreateRecordingResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreateRecordingResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: No CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreatePullPointSubscriptionResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: No CreateTrackResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send CreateTrackResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Fault on CreateTrackResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT sends Fault on CreateTrackResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Fault on DeleteTrackResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT sends Fault on DeleteTrackResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: No DeleteTrackResponse message
Test.Description: The DUT did not send DeleteTrackResponse message.

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: No PMSPullMessagesResponse message
Test.Description: DUT did not send PMSPullMessagesResponse message

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong Topic
Test.Description: Wrong topic in notification

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: Wrong UTC-Time
Test.Description: DUT sends message with wrong UTC-Time

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"
Test.Description: DUT sends message without Source.SimpleItem item with Name="RecordingToken"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: no Source.SimpleItem item with Name="TrackToken"
Test.Description: DUT sends message without Source.SimpleItem item with Name="TrackToken"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message for not existing RecordingToken
Test.Description: DUT sends message for not existing RecordingToken

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: DUT sends 3 messages
Test.Description: DUT sends 3 messages instead of 2

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect notification: message for wrong TrackToken
Test.Description: DUT sends message for wrong RecordingToken

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Correct response: CreateTrackResponse SOAP 1.2 fault message (Action/MaxTracks)
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recording can be created Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="true"

Test.TestName: RECORDING-5-1-13 RECORDING CONTROL – DELETE TRACK EVENT (DELETE TRACK)
Test.Name: Incorrect response: CreateTrackResponse SOAP 1.2 fault message (Action/MaxTracks)
Test.Description: Annex A.10: Recording can be created Annex A.6: DynamicRecordings="true" Impossible to delete any Track
